components.label: Parent ID (Calculated)
components.calculateValue: value = data.parentId_orgs || data.parentId_contact || data.parentId_uwContracts || data.parentId_uwCampaigns || data.parentId_uwSpots || value;

components.label: Engineer

tabulatorList.dataTransform: javascript: const serviceLabels = { fmBroadcast: 'FM Broadcast', liveStream: 'Live Stream', studio: 'Studio Equipment', itNetwork: 'IT / Network', powerHvac: 'Power / HVAC' }; return (submissions || []).map(sub => { const data = sub.data || {}; const services = []; if (data.affectedServices) { Object.entries(data.affectedServices).forEach(([key, value]) => { if (value === true) { services.push(serviceLabels[key] || key); } }); } return { ...sub, affectedServicesDisplay: services.join(', ') }; });

components.label: Incident Summary
components.placeholder: Brief title of the issue (e.g., 'Transmitter VSWR High')

components.label: Detailed Description
components.placeholder: Describe what happened, error messages observed, and initial symptoms.

components.label: Immediate Actions Taken
components.placeholder: What steps were taken to mitigate or resolve the issue immediately?

components.description: Leave blank if same as physical address

components.description: Overview of messaging, key points to include
